changelog: UI: Yellow box around search input for visibility
UI: Smaller microphone icon (less vertical space)
FIX: Member detail close button works properly
Roster now requires PIN to access
Tap name to see member details
NEW: Roster - tap to call any HNFD member

NEW: Flip card for driver zones map
FIX: Speech no longer stutters on start
